title: Great British Bake Off fans reckon two contestants have found a romantic spark
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Fans of The Great British Bake Off have been sent into meltdown by a rumoured romance.

After Alice Fevronia, a contestant on the show, shared a snap on Instgaram of Henry Bird and Michael Chakraverty cuddling as they baked, Twitter went into a wholesome overload.

What's more, Alice captioned the post "Bae-ke Off", along with a heart emoji.

Alice has previously been forced to deny she and Henry were an item after being spotted together - she's since referred to him as her "brother from another mother."

Fans pieced together the evidence for a Henry-Michael romance, which included Alice's previous post of herself, Michael and Henry, with winner David Atherton, captioned: "But how many couples can you see...?"

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

To say it's something the Bake Off Twittersphere is excited about would be a dramatic understatement.

One laughed: "2nd most important question: Who wins Bake Off 2019?

"Most important question: ARE HENRY AND MICHAEL TOGETHER OR NOT?"

Before last night's final, one fan joked: "Tonight's Bake Off finale is just gonna be me on Henry and Michael watch."

A third could hardly contain themselves: "If Henry and Michael from Bake Off are dating...I stg I'm gonna lose my marbles!"

A fourth was intensely dramatic: "I try not to put too much stake into queer celeb dating rumours but my heart might shatter if it turns out Michael and Henry from this season of Bake Off aren't dating."

(Image: Channel 4)

Neither Henry nor Michael made it to the final in the baking tent, with Henry given the boot in the quarterfinals and Michael being the eighth to leave after suffering the fated soggy bottom.

Last night's show saw David storm to victory, a decision deemed controversial by fans because he'd never won a Star Baker Award.

Others reckoned other finalists Alice or Steph Blackwell should have been given the trophy.

One wrote: "Fuming David won #GBBO Steph has been amazing throughout and had at least won star baker numerous times..."

Another raged: "Gutted for Steph - one bad week doesn't take away all those weeks as star baker #GBBO."
description: Fans think Henry Bird and Michael Chakraverty are dating after co-star Alice Feveronia dropped a cute cuddling snap
